p: The two future scenarios showed areas with potential habitat outside of the M region. The FPH in the RCP 4.5 scenario has 44883.4 km 2, whereas FPH in the temperature increase scenario (RCP 8.5) has 77694.3 km 2 outside the area M ( Fig 5). These potential areas outside the M region are located in the north of the Amazon River (North Brazil and Guianas) (up to14°N latitude) and in the southern Brazilian coast (up to 32°S latitude).
